item.title: Daily Meditation
item.description: 15-Mar-2025 – On Value Date: March 16, 2025 Tags: christ, faith, value 29 Are not two sparrows sold for a copper coin? And not one of them falls to the ground apart from your Father’s will. 30 But the very hairs of your head are all numbered. Read More 16-Mar-2025 – On Assurance Date: March 16, 2025 Tags: assurance, christ, everlasting, faith, life, reaping 7 Do not be deceived, God is not mocked; for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.
